has research problem: Text Preprocessing in Neural Network Architectures

has research problem.from sentence: Text preprocessing is often the first step in the pipeline of a Natural Language Processing (NLP) system, with potential impact in its final performance.

has research problem: role of preprocessing the input text

has research problem.from sentence: In this paper we focus on the role of preprocessing the input text, particularly in how it is split into individual (meaning-bearing) tokens and how it affects the performance of standard neural text classification models based on Convolutional Neural Networks (LeCun et al., 2010; Kim, 2014, CNN).
